captions.text:
HI GUYS IM CATIE WAYNE AND THIS IS ANIMALIST
NEWS!

SO, JUST A FEW DAYS AGO THE LARGEST PREDATORY
FISH ON EARTH MADE THE FIRST TRANS ATLANTIC

WHITE SHARK MIGRATION IN RECORDED HISTORY.
NO BIG DEAL.

THE NON PROFIT OCEARH (OH- SEARCH) HAS BEEN
FOLLOWING LYDIA THE WHITE SHARK FOR THE PAST

YEAR TO BETTER UNDERSTAND THE LIFE CYCLE,
HEALTH AND REPRODUCTIVE BEHAVIOR OF GREAT
WHITES.

WHAT THEY DIDN’T EXPECT WAS TO SEE THE 14
FOOT, 2,000 POUND FISH TRAVEL ALMOST 20,000
MILES !

IT WAS THOUGHT THAT LYDIA WAS HEADING STRAIGHT
FOR THE UK, BUT IN THE PAST FEW DAYS, SHE

HAS BEGUN TO VEER NORTHWEST, HEADING WHO KNOWS
WHERE… MAYBE THE MEDITERRANEAN, OR MAYBE

SHE’LL JUST CALL IT A YEAR AND HEAD BACK
TO FLORIDA IN TIME FOR SPRING BREAK.

OH, AND DID I MENTION THAT SHE MIGHT BE PREGNANT?
YEP, THIS BEAUTIFUL BEAST MIGHT BE PACKING

PACKING SHARK PUPS, ALL WHILE SETTING RECORDS
AND STUFF. (I’D LIKE TO ADD THAT I THINK

IT’S SUPER CUTE THAT SHARK BABIES ARE CALLED
PUPS. JUST SAYING.)

RESEARCHERS HAVE BEEN TRACKING LYDIA TO BETTER
UNDERSTAND THE LIFE CYCLE OF GREAT WHITES,

SINCE LITTLE IS KNOWN ABOUT THEIR MATING,
BREEDING, AND MATURATION, MAKING IT HARD TO
MAKE CONSERVATION DECISIONS.

IF YOU GUYS WANT TO FOLLOW LYDIA’S NEXT
MOVE, CHECK HOMEGIRL OUT ON THE GLOBAL SHARK

TRACKER, WHICH YOU CAN FIND A LINK TO IN THE
DOOBLY DOO.

WHAT DO YOU GUYS THINK ABOUT LYDIAS ATLANTIC
MIGRATION? LET ME KNOW IN THE COMMENTS BELOW.

title: How Far Can A Great White Shark Swim Without Stopping?
